headline.main: Police: Boy Playing With Gun Shoots Friend, 13, in the Face
headline.print_headline: Police: Boy Playing With Gun Shoots Friend, 13, in the Face

docs.snippet: A 14-year-old boy was charged Monday with killing a 13-year-old boy after shooting him in the face while they were playing with a gun at a Pennsylvania home, police said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A 14-year-old boy was charged Monday with killing a 13-year-old boy after shooting him in the face while they were playing with a gun at a Pennsylvania home, police said.

headline.main: No. 1 Seed Jayhawks Rolling Along in NCAA Tournament
headline.print_headline: No. 1 Seed Jayhawks Rolling Along in NCAA Tournament

docs.snippet: The overall No. 1 seed in the NCAA Tournament did nothing to dispute its front-runner status through the opening weekend, despite upsets galore that rendered so many brackets nothing more than confetti....
docs.lead_paragraph: The overall No. 1 seed in the NCAA Tournament did nothing to dispute its front-runner status through the opening weekend, despite upsets galore that rendered so many brackets nothing more than confetti.

headline.main: Patriots Owner Kraft Seeks 'Deflategate' Draft Picks Back
headline.print_headline: Patriots Owner Kraft Seeks 'Deflategate' Draft Picks Back

docs.snippet: New England Patriots owner Robert Kraft has asked the NFL to reinstate the draft picks the team lost in the deflated footballs investigation stemming from the 2014 AFC title game....
docs.lead_paragraph: New England Patriots owner Robert Kraft has asked the NFL to reinstate the draft picks the team lost in the deflated footballs investigation stemming from the 2014 AFC title game.

headline.main: Tim Cook on iPhone Data Privacy

docs.snippet: The chief executive of Apple, Timothy D. Cook, said that the company did not expect to be at odds with the government over iPhone encryption, but that it would not back down....
docs.lead_paragraph: The chief executive of Apple, Timothy D. Cook, said that the company did not expect to be at odds with the government over iPhone encryption, but that it would not back down.

headline.main: Ohio Village Hit by Lead in Drinking Water Gets US Grant
headline.print_headline: Ohio Village Hit by Lead in Drinking Water Gets US Grant

docs.snippet: The U.S. Department of Agriculture has agreed to pay for improvements at an Ohio village's water treatment plant to help stop corrosive water from leaching lead into tap water....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Department of Agriculture has agreed to pay for improvements at an Ohio village's water treatment plant to help stop corrosive water from leaching lead into tap water.

headline.main: Shell JV Deer Park Refinery Restarting Gasoline Unit-Sources
headline.print_headline: Shell JV Deer Park Refinery Restarting Gasoline Unit-Sources

docs.snippet: Royal Dutch Shell Plc's 316,600 barrel per day (bpd) joint-venture refinery in Deer Park, Texas, was attempting to restart its main gasoline-producing unit on Monday, said sources familiar with plant operations....
docs.lead_paragraph: Royal Dutch Shell Plc's 316,600 barrel per day (bpd) joint-venture refinery in Deer Park, Texas, was attempting to restart its main gasoline-producing unit on Monday, said sources familiar with plant operations.

headline.main: Swiss-Dutch Taxation Pact Not Applicable in UBS Case, Says Swiss Court
headline.print_headline: Swiss-Dutch Taxation Pact Not Applicable in UBS Case, Says Swiss Court

docs.snippet: Switzerland is barred from helping the Netherlands in a tax case that centres on a Dutch client of UBS after a Swiss court ruled that requested details were too broad to be covered by the information-sharing agreement between the countries....
docs.lead_paragraph: Switzerland is barred from helping the Netherlands in a tax case that centres on a Dutch client of UBS after a Swiss court ruled that requested details were too broad to be covered by the information-sharing agreement between the countries.

headline.main: Diebold CEO Says Confident Will Gain Enough Support for Wincor Takeover
headline.print_headline: Diebold CEO Says Confident Will Gain Enough Support for Wincor Takeover

docs.snippet: U.S. ATM maker Diebold is optimistic it will gain the required level of support for its planned $1.8 billion (1.2 billion pounds) takeover of German rival Wincor Nixdorf, its CEO told Reuters....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. ATM maker Diebold is optimistic it will gain the required level of support for its planned $1.8 billion (1.2 billion pounds) takeover of German rival Wincor Nixdorf, its CEO told Reuters.

headline.main: Andrew Howe and Fabrizio Donato Among Eight Cleared by Italy of Doping Claims
headline.print_headline: Howe, Donato Among Eight Cleared by Italy of Doping Claims

docs.snippet: Italy's Olympic Committee (CONI) has acquitted eight athletes, including bronze medalist Fabrizio Donato and former European champion long jumper Andrew Howe, of failing to supply doping samples....
docs.lead_paragraph: Italy's Olympic Committee (CONI) has acquitted eight athletes, including bronze medalist Fabrizio Donato and former European champion long jumper Andrew Howe, of failing to supply doping samples.

headline.main: Notre Dame's Zaire Frustrated by Quarterback Competition
headline.print_headline: Notre Dame's Zaire Frustrated by Quarterback Competition

docs.snippet: Notre Dame quarterback Malik Zaire doesn't try to hide his frustration to be competing for the starter's job for a third straight spring after a broken right ankle cut his season short last fall....
docs.lead_paragraph: Notre Dame quarterback Malik Zaire doesn't try to hide his frustration to be competing for the starter's job for a third straight spring after a broken right ankle cut his season short last fall.
